0.title: Python / Backend Software Engineer
0.description:
Datapeople helps recruiting teams make more thoughtful and accurate decisions about their recruiting process, from the job posts they write to the data they report on. We know that small changes can have big impacts and while we're very happy to serve some of the most forward-thinking talent teams on the planet including Twitch, BuzzFeed, and Oscar Health, at the heart of our mission is an absolute love for candidates and empathy for the challenges they face when trying to get a job.

We are looking for an experienced Python Software Engineer to help us develop data products that help recruiting teams understand and improve their hiring pipelines and processes. You'll work within the engineering team, reporting to our Head of Engineering.

You will:

Build scalable data pipelines that integrate multiple data sources (both internal as well as external APIs).
Create resilient data extraction and transformation processes with monitoring
Prototype and productize data products and data models
Develop internal tools that will be used by the data and engineering teams
Create code that is maintainable and includes relevant tests. Maintain and advocate for these standards through code review within the engineering team.

This is a remote job and available to all candidates with work privileges currently residing in the United States.

You have:

4 or more years of experience building large-scale software applications with Python
Work experience with SQL and common relational database systems
Work experience with debugging and optimizing data flows
Experience with unit, functional, and performance testing
Preferred: Experience using NoSQL databases (e.g. ElasticSearch)
Preferred: Familiarity with containerized development workflows
Preferred: Experience deploying data pipelines through AWS

Our benefits:

Comprehensive healthcare plans
Flexible PTO policy
401k retirement plan
Commuter benefits
Remote-friendly team and open to more flexible work arrangements

We come to work every day with the mission of making opportunities more accessible and the recruiting process fairer for candidates. We're a remote-first company with linguists, engineers, and scientists working all across the United States.

We care deeply about fairness (it's our mission) so you can be ensured that your application will never be judged based on your religious belief, age, color, race, creed, marital status, gender, sexual orientation, political affiliation, ethnic origin, family status or disability.

1.title: Python Developer
1.description:
Dear Python Devs,

A fast growing LA based Ecommerce Tech company is looking for Python developers in North America, South America and Europe. If you consider yourself a motivated Pythonist with plenty of initiative, we have the perfect job for you. We work with our Shuup eCommerce Platform. Shuup is Shopify with Steroids, and is used to build enterprise online marketplaces (such as Amazon and Grubhub) through which multiple vendors can sell physical or digital products and services.

We wish from you that:
You are confident in working with Django and you love writing Python language.
You know JavaScript and maybe some of its new trends and you’re not afraid to write CSS or HTML, either.
You are somewhat familiar with LESS, SASS, jQuery and ES6.
You are interested in software development as a craft and wish to grow as a developer.

In addition, we value
Experience in agile software development methods.
Experience from software development projects.
You wish to share your knowledge with other developers.
Positive attitude and a willingness to learn.
You have experience or interest in E-Commerce.
Prior experience in using open source technologies in software development.
Fluency in English.

Why Shuup?
We trust in Python and solution-oriented working. For every Shuuper, we plan an individual python programmer career path and support it along the way. We have a wide range of projects and we promise that you won’t get bored with us. We offer a competitive salary and other benefits. You may also choose to work either remotely or at the office, that is totally up to you.

Why us?
Our success in the Great Place to Work studies tells a lot about how we feel about our employees. We will support your professional development in many ways and encourage employees also to participate in developing our company. When the organizational culture is being originated and nurtured by employees, it becomes authentic, honest and laid-back.

We offer
An interesting and motivated work environment with great co-workers
The opportunity to be a part of building an international success story
Interesting and challenging projects – not just repetitive work!
Extensive remote work possibilities

2.title: Senior Python Developer - Innovative Data Platform - $180k
2.description:
A VC-Backed first-of-its-kind platform in the data domain is scaling out its founding engineering team to work fully remote in the US.

This company is using cutting edge technology to solve problems around the complexity of data and infrastructure for its rapidly growing client base.

The Job
Own the development of new features and support existing product
Design and then build backend features with internal stakeholders and future scalability in-mind
Interface with analytical databases

About You
5+ years' experience in Backend software development and API design, the tech stack is Python3, Flask, PostgresSQL, Celery
Experience working in a fast-growth startup
Able to communicate ideas effectively

Package
Circa $180k + equity + benefits
Fully remote

3.title: Python Developer
3.description:
Job Title:  Python Developer
Location: 100% Remote
Industry: Real Estate Technology
Terms: Permanent / Direct Hire
Pay Range:  $110,000 - $135,000 + benefits
Visas & C2C: Not eligible
Search Criteria:

6+ years of Python development
Proficiency with AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Glue, Lambda, and Redshift)
Experience with SQL and NoSQL data sources
Experience with CI/CD tools (Git, Jenkins, Gitlab)
Kafka or similar data streaming tech (nice to have)

Job Summary:
Seeking a Python Developer to join one of the fastest growing real estate technology companies in the country. The heart of our growth is enabled by embracing an inclusive environment, encouraging individual development, rewarding innovative excellence, and supporting our community. As part of our team, you would be helping to seamlessly connect clients to their best real estate professionals and transform the US’s largest consumer industry. 

Job Duties:
Work with business stakeholders, product owners, developers, and data scientists to design and develop high-quality software and data architectures for batch and streaming data pipelines
Responsible for end-to-end delivery of data products, from architecture and design to implementation to maintenance and growth that serve Business intelligence and reporting
Predictive algorithms and data mining
Strategic and tactical research and analyses
Identify, prioritize, and execute tasks in the data engineering development life cycle
Develop tools and applications by producing clean, efficient code
Participate in code reviews and offer suggestions and guidance
Collaborate across internal business teams and cross-functional stakeholders
Actively coordinate efforts with other internal development team
Highly motivated and have a passion for creating and supporting great products
Guide, coach, and mentor data engineering and analytics team members

Ideal Background:
6+ years of development experience including the ability to write expert-level, maintainable, and robust code using Python, SQL, and relational database.
4+ years designing, accessing, and maintaining data warehouses; developing and maintaining ETL pipelines & dimensional data modeling
3+ years with experience with AWS services, such as EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, Glue, Step Functions, Athena, and Redshift
Experience using source control (Git preferred)
Comfortable with CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, TravisCI, or GitLab Runners
Agile team development experience
Bachelors degree and 6+ years of experience or Master’s degree and 3+ years of experience

4.title: Sr. Python Developer (100% Remote)
4.description:
Position Sr. Python or Java developer with strong Database Exp.

Duration Long term

Location NYC

Remote work until covid clears

Lookout for Sr.Python or Java developers with a very strong database .

Must have building distributed data processing using Java, data frames, Strong backend developer.

Job Description

Strong hands-on knowledge of Python or Java as a distributed data developer, working on large data volumes (20m+ rows per day)

Ability to deliver multiple simultaneous projects under pressure of regulatory driven deadlines

Strong relational database experience with emphasis on data processing as described above

Strong knowledge of database table partitions, data distribution, parallel loads and extracts working on DB2 DPF or Greenplum or other big data technologies

Build batch vs. event driven data processing. Design for high level of concurrency to ensure data integrity without compromising performance

Modeling and implementing database schemas

Coming up with system architecturere-design proposals for greater efficiency and ease of maintenance and developing software to turn proposals into implementations

Skills Required

Strong hands-on knowledge of Python or Java as a distributed data developer, working on large data volumes (20m+ rows per day)

Ability to deliver multiple simultaneous projects under pressure of regulatory driven deadlines

10+ years of relational database experience with emphasis on data processing as described above

Excellent analytical ability

Strong collaboration and communication skills.

5.title: Desenvolvedor(a) Frontend React | Sênior (Remoto)
5.description:
O Kyte

O Kyte é um aplicativo para ajudar pequenos comerciantes a saírem do papel e da caneta e darem o primeiro passo na gestão e digitalização de seus negócios. O Kyte possui mais de 30 mil clientes ativos e cresce em ritmo acelerado. Estamos presentes em mais de 143 países, sendo principalmente, Brasil, EUA, México, demais países da América Latina e alguns países do Sudeste Asiático, como Filipinas e Malásia.

Durante o ano de 2020 o Kyte provou ser uma ferramenta essencial para ajudar milhares de pequenos comércios que foram obrigados a fechar suas operações e passar para o Online. Assim, nossa base de clientes mais do que triplicou durante o ano de 2020 e não vamos desacelerar. Estamos captando investimento e temos planos para triplicar a equipe em 2021 que atualmente é de 30 pessoas.

Estamos crescendo e precisamos de mais profissionais incríveis e apaixonados pelo que fazem, para fazer parte desse super time!

A Kyte

A Kyte é uma startup que nasceu em Florianópolis, mas atualmente está com o time todo distribuído (principalmente em Florianópolis e São Paulo). Nós temos uma grande ambição de atender cada vez mais clientes em todo o mundo. Ficamos felizes com as dezenas de depoimentos que chegam todos os dias contando como "salvamos" seus negócios. Estamos sempre pensando em melhorar, seja o produto, negócio, processos ou nós mesmos. Acreditamos que satisfação no trabalho é ter um grande desafio com as ferramentas adequadas e a visibilidade de que estamos sempre evoluindo. Somos ágeis e gostamos de uma comunicação pragmática e abundante, mas sempre com muito respeito. Sabemos que somente um time incrível de pessoas é capaz de grandes conquistas. Nosso código de cultura completo está disponível neste link (

Quem procuramos

Porém, Existem Alguns Atributos Que Não Podem Faltar

As competências necessárias para ser uma excelente pessoa programadora está mais conectado com perfil do que formação, então aceitamos candidatos com qualquer formação.

Desenvolvedor(a) Front-end: com experiência, conhecimentos sólidos em componentização, onde os componentes criados sejam de fácil manutenção e com Design responsivo para aplicativo Android e iOS. Que tenha experiência em CSS e CSS in JS, pré processadores SASS e LESS, React e JSX, Redux e Javascript (ES6).
Precisa desenvolver com as melhores práticas utilizando metodologias para manter um código limpo e legível.

Prazer em programar: você deve ter prazer genuíno em programar aplicativos. Ter interesse e curiosidade para entender de fato o produto e muita vontade em entregar a melhor solução.

Dinamismo: você abraça desafios e os vê como uma oportunidade para aprender ou executar algo novo. Você gosta também de apresentar suas ideias e está sempre disposto a encontrar novas maneiras de nos ajudar a crescer.

Cultura Kyte: We work hard and play to win. Somos uma startup em rápido crescimento, o clima é descontraído, mas de muita responsabilidade e desafios no dia a dia. Nosso time é de alta performance e movido por métricas e resultados. Buscamos qualidade em tudo o que fazemos e estamos sempre em busca do desenvolvimento pessoal. Também prezamos por transparência e honestidade.

Essencial (Conhecimentos Sólidos)
Git
Componentização
Boa modularização e reuso de código
CSS e CSS in JS
Pré processadores SASS e LESS
Design responsivo
Javascript (ES6)
React e JSX
Gerenciamento de estado (Redux)
Programação funcional
Saber escrever lógica de negócio
Consumo de API's REST
Debugging

Desejável / Diferencial
React-native
IOS Swift
Android
Experiência com aplicações mobile
PWA
Storybook JS

O que oferecemos
Contratação CLT;
Remuneração mensal competitiva (nosso budget é flexível, você nos dirá quanto quer ganhar e analisaremos em relação ao mercado);
Trabalho flexível, podendo ser 100% remoto ou híbrido entre remoto (de casa) e presencial em coworkings;
Vale-transporte Flexível - nos avise quando for para o escritório e o meio de transporte que irá utilizar (até R$20,00 por dia)
Auxílio Home Office (R$ 150,00/mês para o trabalho remoto);
Equipamentos - Iremos fornecer todos os itens para tornar o seu home office adequado e saudável (desde o notebook, até mesa e cadeira se necessário);
Day off para o seu aniversário;
Happy Hour Virtual, uma sexta-feira por mês (R$25,00);
Plano de Saúde (após 3 meses);
Plano Odontológico (após 3 meses);
Auxílio Educação (após 3 meses);
Cartão multi-benefícios:
Vale-refeição ou alimentação: R$ 600,00;
Vale bem-estar (após 3 meses): R$ 80,00.

6.title: Senior Python Developer | Top Start-up | Remote
6.description:
Senior Python Developer | San Francisco/REMOTE | Fast-growing Tech Organization

My client, a fast-growing FinTech company based in San Francisco is looking for a talented Senior Python Developer to join their expanding team. They want passionate people that will come on board to work on their client site on exceptional projects and products.

Key skills necessary are:
Expertise in Python, ideally 5+ years
Strong knowledge of Django
Experience with AWS
Great testing practices
Agile project management
Proven delivery methods and organisational skills

This is an excellent opportunity to work for a fast-growing Tech Organization.

My client is conducting interviews and on-boarding fully remotely. This role is based out of San Francisco, it is a fully-remote opportunity forever.

Excellent salary, bonus and benefits on offer!

Send in your details ASAP to find out more and receive a full job specification.

7.title: Senior Python Developer
7.description:
Project Description

Applying to the position, you may join one of the most respected and fastest growing institutional investors in the world. Our client is a professional investment management organization that globally invests the funds to ensure long-term sustainability. The company invests in all major asset classes, including public equity, private equity, real estate, infrastructure and fixed-income instruments, and currently has offices in Toronto, London, Hong Kong, New York, São Paulo, Luxembourg and Mumbai.
Client attracts and selects high-calibre individuals from top-tier institutions around the globe. Join our team and look forward to:
Diverse and inspiring colleagues and approachable leaders
Stimulating work in a fast-paced, intellectually challenging environment
Accelerated exposure and responsibility
Global career development opportunities
Being motivated every day by important social purpose and unshakable principles
A deeply rooted culture of Integrity, Partnership and High Performance
If you share a passion for performance, value a collegial and collaborative culture, and approach everything with the highest integrity, here's an opportunity.

Responsibilities
Manage timelines/deliverables within the team towards the successful delivery of projects.
Design software solutions by interacting with portfolio managers, traders, operations staff and peers to understand requirements.
Develop solutions that are in line with client's technology biases, deliver efficiency and scalability, and enable new trading activities.
Provide knowledge transfer to team members and support staff through application demos, walkthroughs, and documentation.

Skills

Must have
University degree in Engineering or Computer Science preferred
Proven track records in team leadership, managing development processes
Must have good communication skills, strong client-facing skills and able to manage client's expectations
Strong technical skills in Python, Performance tuning, NumPy, pylint/pytest, Pandas 6+ years
Strong knowledge of SQL to be able to make queries, update structure and normalize data 3+ years
Git, Jenkins, urbancode, liquibase, SonarQube 4+ years
Jira, Confluence - confident user
Agile, Scrum framework 2+ years' experience on past projects
Nice to have
Capital Markets domain experience

Languages
English: B2 Upper Intermediate

8.title: Senior Frontend Developer
8.description:
The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, multi-tasker, and demonstrated team-player. Our CNN Digital Consumer Experience team has multiple levels of Front End Engineering opportunities. We are open to individuals being remote for our positions.

Our CNN Digital Consumer business units includes CNN Politics, CNN Business and CNN Breaking News. All our web and mobile based business units.

When it comes to technology stacks. We're open to individuals who have a wide variety of technology skill sets with different Front End Engineering.. Our preference is for individuals who have development experience in NodeJS, React, VueJS, Python, AWS, Serverless framework, and Terraform.

If you are interested please feel free to apply. Once our Technology Recruiter's will be in contact with you within 24 to 48 hours.

Thanks!

9.title: Senior Frontend Developer
9.description:
About ShipHero

Hello. We are ShipHero (https://shiphero.com). We have built a software platform entrusted by hundreds of ecommerce companies, large and small to run their operations and we continue to grow. About US$5 billion of ecommerce orders are shipped a year via ShipHero. Many of our customers sell on Shopify, Amazon and many other platforms. We’re driven to help our customers grow their businesses by providing a platform that solves complex problems, and is engineered to be reliable and fast. We are obsessed with building great technology, that is beautiful, easy to use and is loved by our customers. Our culture also reflects our ethos and belief that by bringing passionate, talented and great people together - you can do great things.
Our team is fully remote, with most of our engineers currently spread over the Americas but have been building out teams in Europe as well. We communicate regularly using video chat and Slack, and put a strong emphasis on asynchronous work so people have large chunks of uninterrupted time to focus and do deep work.

About You

You understand that great things are accomplished when teams work together.
You’ve made a lot of mistakes, and most importantly, have learned from them.
You can code review other team members work and provide assistance and appreciate feedback.
You’ve learned from building systems and solutions the reasons to avoid technical debt, and how to approach and implement tests and CI practices.
4+ years of experience writing Javascript, mostly with React
You are comfortable and even enjoy mentoring others in different skill-sets

The Role

Work on a cross-functional team including backend and UX to build solutions that are easy for customers to understand, work consistently and scale well.
Review features and requirements, design and implement solutions.
Understand business requirements and think through solutions in terms of not just the coding implementation but also how the solution fits into the solution and how it solves a customer need.
Ability to estimate effort and ship on agreed schedule.
Perform regular code reviews, with the goal of code quality, good design and approach along with pushing engineers to improve and evolve.
Optimize existing tech stack and solutions, determine path to next step in the evolution.
Learn, and push those around you to do the same - this is a craft that you’re constantly improving upon.
Implement solutions that are pragmatic to get the platform built.
Have the confidence to work with experienced and talented people to just build great things, you’re not a “rock star”.

Perks

$2.500 so you can buy any equipment you need to be happy at your job
20 days paid vacation + new year & Christmas
Conference days don't count against your vacation days, we want you to stay up-to-date
We will pay for courses & conferences, if you learn we all learn
Salary range is wide since we're hiring for different seniority levels, the range is $60.000 - $90.000 / year depending on experience

10.title: Sr Python Developer
10.description:
One of our largest clients, outside of the banks, is looking to bring on a Sr Python developer to sit sit remote. You would be part of a team doing greenfield development and creating a quality data ingestion engine.
Required Skills:

• Frontend web development experience using Javascript, Angular preferred
• Knowledgeable in data structures and SQL or no-SQL databases such as Dynamo DB or Mongo DB
• CI/CD Pipeline Deployment

• Experience in an AWS environment a plus

11.title: RoR Full Stack Developer opportunity with Insurance client! Virtual Interview, Immediate Remote Start!
11.description:
Our Insurance client is seeking a qualified RoR Full Stack Developer with the following 3+ years of full stack development experience with the Ruby on Rails stack Experienced in ground up development and the full SDLC with the ability to create and advise on software development best practices Extensive use of HTML and CSS as well solid knowledge in the following frameworks, tools and libraries Stimulus.js, Turbolinks.js, ViewComponent, ag-Grid, and Tailwind CSS (preference for Stimulus.js

Turbolinks.js) Background in quality coding and testing with preferred exposure to TDD (test driven development), static code checking, and projects looking to establish 100 test coverage

Syfter is a staffing firm headquartered in Manhattan, NY, that provides creative solutions for clients and talent nationally. Our team of experts works tirelessly to create great connections industry-wide, and after decades in the industry, we deliver best-of-breed methodology for the best hiring experience.

13.title: Python Developer-Remote (3668)
13.description:
Flexion Inc. a Madison, WI based IT Consulting and Services firm is looking for a Python Developer to work on a remote consulting project. The client for this position is based in Raleigh, NC but the work can be done remotely from anywhere in the United States. Initial duration of this work is in the 5-6 month range with the potential for extension.



The most efficient way to reach our recruiting team is to submit your resume through the URL provided. If you have questions or would like more information about this job posting, or if would like to know more about Flexion Inc. please contact Chris Giese 608-837-6411.



This person will work as part of a small team doing Python Development to build a data integration management application for scientific data.

Equal Employment Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer

14.title: Senior Python Developer
14.description:
POSITION IS FULLY REMOTE THROUGH COVID-19

JOB AT A GLANCE: 



Ampersand is seeking Senior Python Developer to help grow The AND Platform – Ampersand’s first step in bringing automation and simplicity to audience-based TV buying, for both local or national campaigns, in a single interface. The ideal candidate has extensive experience developing data intensive software as part of a data science or machine learning engineering group. We make extensive use of Bayesian methods (PyMC3) so our model deployments are fairly computationally intensive. This role allows for great opportunity to work in a startup-like environment within a larger company and create impact by partnering with teams across the organization.

For more information on The AND Platform, watch here: https://vimeo.com/386712360
ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS: 

Software design, testing, and maintenance in Python

EDUCATION, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:

Ability to communicate and collaborate with stakeholders across Ampersand and to present clear oral and written arguments
Degree in quantitative field like math, statistics, operations research, economics, or physics
Advanced degree or equivalent experience preferred
4+ years of experience as a data scientist

We are looking for a Python expert comfortable independently leading software development projects from start to tested completion. We use git for version control and expect that the candidate will have significant experience with git-based workflows.

You can review an example of the kind of code we write here: https://github.com/ampersandtv/pymc3-hmm

Experience with the following technologies/practices is preferred but not required:

AWS
CI/CD
Kubernetes
Monitoring/Logging
SQL
Columnar storage databases, e.g. clickhouse and redshift

We work extensively with the following Python libraries so any experience with them will be beneficial:

dask
pymc3/theano/arviz
numpy/scipy/pandas
pytest
fastapi
BENEFITS: Ampersand offers a competitive salary plus benefits package including medical, dental, & vision plans, (PTO) paid time off, 401K, & tuition reimbursement. Please visit our website at https://ampersand.tv for more information on our products and services.

Ampersand welcomes all qualified applicants to apply without regard to race, color, nationality, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, disability or age. We are an equal opportunity employer committed to belonging, equity and diversity.

15.title: Sr JavaScript/Front End Developer - 100% REMOTE!
15.description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Trident Solutions, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

This is a long-term fully remote contract position. Responsible for ensuring that browser-based systems and applications meet client requirements and operate properly, using software development methodologies.

17.title: Senior Frontend Developer
17.description:
Senior Frontend Developer
North American Bancard - Remote
The Senior Frontend Developer will have a track record of positive development work product and is able to work with teams that are remote. The engineer we are looking for must be self-disciplined, passionate about innovation, and committed to a positive customer experience. In this role, you will provide consultation on large, complex frontend projects and a wide degree of creativity and latitude is expected.

What you'll be doing: 
Working on a team of remote senior engineers to create next gen web based POS systems
Managing large frontend projects
Design, testing, and debugging new code & features

What we need from you:
10 years experience as a software engineer 
Experience with the following:
TypeScript (required)
JavaScript (required)
CSS (required)
Unit Testing Frontend code (required)
ReactJS (required)
NodeJS (required)
Material UI (desired)
Webpack (desired)
Jest (desired)
AWS experience (desired)


This position is 100% remote open to any time zone in continental United States.


Salary: $93,000+ (based on experience) 
Benefits included: Medical, Dental, Vision, 401k + match, etc.

At North American Bancard Holdings, LLC (NAB) our vision is a new paradigm of commerce that simplifies the modern business model — driving smarter operations, enhancing security, and fostering effortless personal interaction between merchants and their customers. Throughout our growth, we've stayed agile in order to stay at the forefront of the ever-changing payments landscape. While we are large enough to offer customized solutions to enterprise-level clients we're still nimble enough to take an award-winning, hands-on approach to personal service you just won't find anyplace else.
At North American Bancard, we celebrate diversity and create an inclusive environment for everyone. We are an equal opportunity employer.

18.title: Software Engineer, Developer Experience
18.description:
Company Description

Square builds common business tools in unconventional ways so more people can start, run, and grow their businesses. When Square started, it was difficult and expensive (or just plain impossible) for some businesses to take credit cards. Square made credit card payments possible for all by turning a mobile phone into a credit card reader. Since then Square has been building an entire business toolkit of both hardware and software products including Square Capital, Square Terminal, Square Payroll, and more. We’re working to find new and better ways to help businesses succeed on their own terms—and we’re looking for people like you to help shape tomorrow at Square.

Job Description

Our Developer Experience (DX) team within Device Software Engineering, looks across the software development life cycle to find opportunities to help speed up delivery and improve the quality of our Hardware and Software products. We are looking for someone to build and architect the next generation of our Python testing framework for Square hardware products. You will report to our Engineering Manager, Developer Experience.

You Will
Build and own Python tooling and frameworks to accelerate hardware development
Create and own new tools to debug and develop Square's hardware products
Be a technical mentor for other engineers on DX

You Have

Qualifications
8+ years of software development experience
Expertise in Python development, packaging, release and best practices
The desire to work across team boundaries with your partners such as; Android and Embedded Product teams
Even better if you have experience in any of the following:
Pytest
Designing and developing automated tests and CI processes for hardware products
Developing virtualized build environments for developing hardware products

Additional Information

At Square, we value diversity and always treat all employees and job applicants based on merit, qualifications, competence, and talent. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance. Applicants in need of special assistance or accommodation during the interview process or in accessing our website may contact us by sending an email to assistance(at)squareup.com. We will treat your request as confidentially as possible. In your email, please include your name and preferred method of contact, and we will respond as soon as possible.

Perks

At Square, we want you to be well and thrive. Our global benefits package includes:
Healthcare coverage
Retirement Plans
Employee Stock Purchase Program
Wellness perks
Paid parental leave
Paid time off
Learning and Development resources

19.title: Junior Python Engineer (Remote in US)
19.description:
Company Description

Thresher's products create value from unstructured text--even when others are trying to manipulate the narrative. Thresher is the result of a collaboration between engineers, data scientists, former intelligence officers, and business executives who understand the needs of experts conducting high stakes analysis in the private and public sectors. We are growing our engineering team as we wrestle with the complex, multidisciplinary challenges that we are helping our clients address.

Job Description

What You’ll Do:
Participate in the software development life cycle including development, testing, maintenance, and support.
Operate in a collaborative agile environment with a focus on transparency and team success.
Create proofs-of concept, prototypes, and production-quality solutions.
Extract, transform, and load (ETL) text data in a variety of written languages.
Engage with peers to review solutions and help ensure our team delivers readable, maintainable, and extensible solutions.
Collaborate with subject matter experts and data scientists to fully understand requirements and participate in proposing solutions.
Qualifications

Ideal Candidate Has
Interest in software engineering best practices
Interest in authoring well-structured and testable code
Familiarity with Python
Familiarity with relational databases
Interest in Scrum and agile methodologies
Experience in learning new technologies, techniques, and practices
Relevant internship experience
Attributes That Are Important To Us
Commitment to delivering high-quality solutions
Enthusiasm for problem-solving
Interest and ability to take initiative
Ability to communicate and collaborate in a diverse and distributed team
Ability to convey complex topics concisely and clearly
Ability and willingness to learn new things
Ability to succeed in a remote work environment
Additional Information

Compensation

is competitive and includes 20 days of vacation, 9 federal holidays, 9 days of sick leave. We cover 100% of health care premiums as well as the premiums for short and long-term disability plus life insurance. We will contribute to your 401K. This is a great opportunity to collaborate on a team with diverse data and social science experience, and work on challenging technical problems in the national security space with dual applications in the commercial sector.

All applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, gender identity, and sexual orientation), national origin, disability, age (age 40 or older), or genetic information. We welcome applications from veterans.

If you are interested, please submit a cover letter describing a challenging problem you solved, why you are interested in working with Thresher, and a resume.

20.title: Python Developer
20.description:
Python with Django - Fulltime - Remote EST hours

Responsibilities
Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code.
Develop new features and improve existing features of the software.
Performance improvements, maintenance and bug fixes.
Contribute to team and organizational improvements in process and infrastructure. Code, test and operate Python based services and applications.
 Requirements
7+ years of Python development engineering experience – need to have strong corporate project experience
2+ years Django – must be real corporate project experience
Familiarity with modern client-side web technologies javascript - React /
Small team experience – must be able to work autonomously

Preferred
Version control tool - GitHub
Clean code base covered with tests; Unit testing or CI

21.title: Python Developer
21.description:
Immediate need for a talented Python Developer. This is a Contract to Hire (CTH) employment opportunity and is Remote. Please review the job description below:

Technology We Use:
Python, Terraform, Amazon Web Services, Github, NewRelic, Pagerduty

What We Look For:
Proficient experience in Python or comparable Java experiences and able to quickly learn Python.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Strong Software Design patterns and industry best practices.
Proven ability to work independently and as part of a team; designing, developing and deploying solutions, and to deliver projects on time with minimal direction
AWS infrastructure experience
End-to-end ownership of product design to delivery.
Experience working in an agile team.
Passionate technologists with an innovative mindset.

22.title: Software Engineer (C++, JavaScript, Python) Boston - 130k-180k
22.description:
This position is for an experienced Software Engineer with a passion for the quality of their code and a desire to work for an organization that is truly making a difference in the medical device space. You will interact with all aspects of their instrument and probe design stack. You will work on instrument system level software, UI development, and data model design.

Client Details

The company are developing next-generation technology in the medical diagnostics space and they're a start-up organization that recently received their Series A funding.

Description

The team are looking for someone to interact with all aspects of their instrument and probe design stack. You will work on instrument system level software, UI development, and data model design. If you care about fault tolerance of your code, then you will enjoy working on this software team

Profile

The successful candidate will have experience with:

- UI Development
- C, C++
- JavaScript
- Python
- React or Vue
- Robotics/Med Device/Biotech experience is nice to have but not essential

Job Offer

The company offers a flexible work environment!

Compensation details include:

A fantastic base salary depending on experience
Unlimited PTO
Medical/Dental/Vision
Equity
Desired Skills and Experience

- UI Development
- C, C++
- JavaScript
- Python
- React or Vue
- Robotics/Med Device/Biotech experience is nice to have but not essential

23.title: Senior Python Developer
23.description:
Rogue Talent is hiring a Senior Python Developer / Machine Learning Engineer to join a fast-paced team endeavoring to enhance & improve public-facing API and Workflow Management and Monitoring System. This exciting hiring client is a pre-seed AI security startup delivering sophisticated tools to safely build and deploy next-gen Artificial General Intelligence backed applications. They are committed to delivering ensuring the long-term security and integrity of the emerging ML/AI technologies of tomorrow. Their leadership consists of battle-hardened, proven engineers and tech evangelists with a successful track record of building and scaling data- and AI-centric platforms and companies.

Qualifications:
Must be very familiar with Python 3
Must have experience with Python’s asynchronous libraries and tools
Must be familiar with message bus and pub/sub data processing environments
Must be well-versed in Git and Docker
Must have a great attitude, enjoy learning new things, and love sharing them with peers
Must be flexible and able to adapt to a fast-paced quickly changing startup environment

Bonus Points:
FastAPI
Kafka and/or Faust
Natural Language Processing (NLP)
PostgreSQL
Redis
GPT3
OpenAI, HuggingFace and/or Eleuther

Comp Package:
$125-150K
Equity options (at the ground floor!)
Healthcare benefits via Gusto
100% remote, tech tools provided

Rogue Talent and its proud portfolio of hiring clients are equal opportunity recruiters & employers. In accordance with anti-discrimination law, it is the purpose of this policy to effectuate these principles and mandates. Our alliance prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type and affords equal employment opportunities to employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, pregnancy, age, national origin, disability status, genetic information, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We conform to the spirit as well as to the letter of all applicable laws and regulations.

24.title: Python Fullstack Developer
24.description:
Our client is an explosive startup within the pharma space that is looking to add IT professionals to their growing offices. The company we represent is dedicated to transformative developments within the healthcare industry. Our client is looking to identify a Full Stack Python Developer to build web components for the company’s Data Warehouse.

What You Will Get:
-Competitive compensation package
-Start-up environment that breeds innovation
-Autonomy within the role

What You Will Do as a Full Stack Python Developer:
-Full stack web development
-Database, ETL, Reporting
-Work on web services and web UI pieces

What You Will Need as a Full Stack Python Developer:

Our client is not offering relocation packages.
